Content: Forgive, I pray You, the sin of this people in the greatness of Your lovingkindness, and as You have forgiven this people from Egypt until now.

Version: The Rashi chumash by Rabbi Shraga Silverstein
Content: Take heed of him and hearken to his voice. Do not rebel against him, for he will not forgive your offenses, [sin being foreign to his nature and forgiveness not being deputed to him. "Take heed of him"] for My name is within him [i.e., associated with him].
